alert.note: Alert for Walsenburg Vicinity, Upper Huerfano River Basin Below 7500 Ft; Wet Mountain Valley Below 8500 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued December 02 at 6:36PM MST until December 03 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 5 PM MST SUNDAY... * WHAT...West winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 75 mph expected. * WHERE...Wet Mountain Valley and Huerfano County with the strongest gusts near the east facing slopes of the mountains. * WHEN...From 11 PM this evening to 5 PM MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Walsenburg Vicinity, Upper Huerfano River Basin Below 7500 Ft; Wet Mountain Valley Below 8500 Ft
